introText:
Not sure where to start with improving your business?

Use our Business Health Check to identify areas you can focus on to help your business thrive.

You can assess:

  • Your business strengths
  • Areas for improvement

You will receive a tailored report with:

  • Next steps and recommendations
  • Links to support and resources

Time required

20-30 minutes total
Approximately 5 minutes per topic.

Your progress will be saved to your current device, allowing you to return and finish the assessment later if you open the quiz in the same browser.

Need support?

You can reach out to a Territory Business Advisor on 1800 193 111.

You may also be interested in our Business Security Tool, which covers business safety and security across a range of topics.

Privacy

We value your privacy and your responses are confidential. Your data will be stored on your own device and will not be accessible to the Northern Territory Government, unless you choose to share your results with a Territory Business Advisor.

Disclaimer

Laws and regulations can change over time. While we aim to provide accurate guidance and point you to helpful resources, it's important to check whether the information is suitable for your specific situation.

Every business is different, so please ensure any advice or material you use is appropriate for your circumstances before making decisions or taking action.
finalSummary: Based on your answers, we provide recommendations to improve safety.
